DataElement.preferredName: Administration, Management Performed Study Activity Duration ISO21090.PQ.TIME.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The completed action within the context of a given study that is not directly related to the study's overarching hypothesis evaluation or testing, but is nonetheless essential to the efficient and/or effective coordination and execution of the study. EXAMPLE(S): assignment to a treatment arm, registration to a study, start of on-study period, end of on-study period, obtain informed consent, verify eligibility criteria, enroll, randomize, complete study visits, exit study, break treatment blind, protocol violation, premature withdrawal, etc. The period of time over which the activity is performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Administration, Management Performed Study Activity Duration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active._The period of time during which something continues.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

Concepts.definition: Performing or possessing executive duties; acting as a supervisor or manager.
Executed and carried through to completion.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredDefinition: The period of time during which something continues.

Concepts.definition: The period of time during which something continues.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Constrains PQ to have units that describe a period of time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happened. (NCI)

Concepts.definition: An expression of both date and time that an event has happened or will happen.
